id="content" role="main"><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/impact-of-psd2-on-the-banking-industry/" rel="bookmark">IMPACT OF PSD2 ON THE BANKING INDUSTRY</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/impact-of-psd2-on-the-banking-industry/"></a>PSD2 is the second payment directive that came into force in January 2016, as a fundamental piece of payments legislation within Europe, and the first European Law to affect sterling payments.Â  It is the artefact of an appraisal of the ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/impact-of-psd2-on-the-banking-industry/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/what-is-psd2/" rel="bookmark">WHAT IS PSD2</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/what-is-psd2/"></a>It’s the second iteration of the Payment Services Directive (PSD) implemented by the European Union. It affects both individual consumers and businesses, and is set to revolutionise the way we make payments online. The PSD was adopted in 2007 to ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/what-is-psd2/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/impact-of-psd2/" rel="bookmark">IMPACT OF PSD2</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/impact-of-psd2/"></a>The second Payments Service Directive (PSD2) from the EU is set to regulate the payment industry across all of the EU. The directive is split into 12 sections, called mandates. Each mandate lays out a set of guidelines or standards ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/impact-of-psd2/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/definition-of-psd2/" rel="bookmark">DEFINITION OF PSD2</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/definition-of-psd2/"></a>New security requirements for online payments will come into effect in Europe in September as part of the revised Payment Services Directive (PSD2), but they are also expected to make an impact in the US and other regions of the world. ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/definition-of-psd2/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bank-reserves-part-2/" rel="bookmark">BANK RESERVES PART 2</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bank-reserves-part-2/"></a>Bank reserves are the minimum cash reserves that financial institutions must keep in their vaults at any given time. These are a commercial bank’s cash holdings physically held by the bank, and deposits held in the bank’s account with the central bank. ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bank-reserves-part-2/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bank-reserves-part-1/" rel="bookmark">BANK RESERVES PART 1</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bank-reserves-part-1/"></a>What Are Bank Reserves? Bank reserves are the cash minimums that must be kept on hand by financial institutions in order to meet central bank requirements. The bank cannot lend the money but must keep it in the vault, on-site ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bank-reserves-part-1/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/stock-exchange/" rel="bookmark">STOCK EXCHANGE</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/stock-exchange/"></a>stock exchange, securities exchange or bourse is a facility where stock brokers and traders can buy and sell securities, such as shares of stock and bonds and other financial instruments. Stock exchanges may also provide facilities for the issue and redemption of such securities and instruments and capital events including the payment of income ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/stock-exchange/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/distribution-channel-of-king-brand-cement-2/" rel="bookmark">DISTRIBUTION CHANNEL OF KING BRAND CEMENT 2</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/distribution-channel-of-king-brand-cement-2/"></a>view with charts and images "Distribution Channel of King Brand Cement.” Chapter 01 1. Executive Summary The topic of the report is “Distribution Channel of King Brand Cement.” This report is broadly categorized in three parts. In part one is Introduction. ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/distribution-channel-of-king-brand-cement-2/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bangladesh-budget-2010-2011-its-impact-on-capital-market/" rel="bookmark">Bangladesh Budget 2010-2011 &amp; Its Impact on Capital Market</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bangladesh-budget-2010-2011-its-impact-on-capital-market/"></a>View With Charts And Images  Introduction    Budget is a numerical expression of a plan. It is essential to every financial or nonfinancial institution. A govt. can not run without its budget. The govt. publishes its budget for every financial ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/bangladesh-budget-2010-2011-its-impact-on-capital-market/">Read More</a> </p></div></article><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/cost-volume-profit-analysis/" rel="bookmark">Cost-Volume-Profit Analysis</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/cost-volume-profit-analysis/"></a>View With Charts And Images Introduction Activity-based costing is a costing method that is designed to provide managers with cost information for strategic and other decisions that potentially affect capacity and therefore “fixed” costs. Activity-based costing is ordinarily used as ...Read More                    <p></p></div><p> <a class="btn" href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/cost-volume-profit-analysis/">Read More</a> style="padding-bottom:20px;"><h2>Bank and financial institutes</h2>Showing 10 posts out of 674                <div class="devider-title" style="margin-bottom:30px;"><span>0</span></div></div><div id="content" role="main"><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/cost-volume-profit-analysis-2/" rel="bookmark">Cost-Volume-Profit Analysis</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/cost-volume-profit-analysis-2/"></a>View With Charts And Images  Introduction Activity-based costing is a costing method that is designed to provide managers with cost information for strategic and other decisions that potentially affect capacity and therefore “fixed” costs. id="content" role="main"><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/foreign-exchange-activities-of-al-arafah-islami-bank-ltd/" rel="bookmark">Foreign Exchange Activities of Al-Arafah Islami Bank Ltd</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a style="padding-bottom:20px;"><h2>Bank and financial institutes</h2>Showing 10 posts out of 674                <div class="devider-title" style="margin-bottom:30px;"><span>0</span></div></div><div id="content" role="main"><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/a-case-study-of-mercantile-bank-limited/" rel="bookmark">A CASE STUDY OF MERCANTILE BANK LIMITED</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/a-case-study-of-mercantile-bank-limited/"></a>View With Charts And Images.. "A Case Study of Mercantile Bank Limited" Chapter 01 1. Introduction The word “Bank” refers to the financial institution dealing with money. Commercial banks are the primary contributors to the economy of the country. style="padding-bottom:20px;"><h2>Bank and financial institutes</h2>Showing 10 posts out of 674                <div class="devider-title" style="margin-bottom:30px;"><span>0</span></div></div><div id="content" role="main"><article class="blog_entry"><header class="blog_entry-header"><div class="blog_entry-header-inner"><h2 class="blog_entry-title"> <a href="https://www.lawyersnjurists.com/article/e-banking-customers-satisfaction-bangladesh-3/" rel="bookmark">E-Banking and Customers’ Satisfaction in Bangladesh</a> </h2></div><!--blog_entry-header-inner--></header><div class="entry-content"><div class="entry-content"><a
